title: Which is better, the Realme 6 Pro or the Redmi Note 9 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, realme 6 pro is better…. But its upto u what is ur use and how u want your mobile to work for u…… Note 9 pro max having its own plus point whereas realme is having its own plus points…. The former has a big battery and a bit slow charging and the later has a bit low battery and fast charging of massive 30 watt…. Both have same processor as there will be no difference in performance. The camera in 6pro is better than pro max…also 6pro has dual punch hole selfie. If u are pubg player then u will enjoy it on both….with smooth ultra and hd high… So its upto u what u prefer….make ur choices fast charging or long battery, better camera or better looks and, most important brand😂

Redmi Note 9 Pro Max The Redmi Note 9 pro box seems to be a standard framing box with pictures of the phone and branding to the top and sides the back has the spec highlights, of course, it has 6k crammed version with 128 gigs of storage the pricing on the box is 21 thousand rupees but we know this is priced at seventeen thousand cutting through the seals to moving the lid inside things are pretty similar to Note 9. Accessories & more… This cardboard box has the user guide as soft keys and a sim ejector pin. The note 9 Pro the difference here is with the charger though it's 33 watts instead of 18 watts. The charging cable here also has these orange accents so barring these changes why is Redmi calling this phone a maxwell generally. When we think of max phones whether it's the iPhone Pro and iPhone pro-Max. So, I think redmi note 9 pro max is best For more information visit the website
